title: Chromosomal and plasmid-encoded virulence and multidrug resistance of Escherichia coli ST58/24 infecting a 2-year-old sickle cell patient with sepsis in Kampala Uganda, East Africa
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Reuben S. Maghembe, Maximilian A.K. Magulye, Emmanuel Eilu, Simon Sekyanzi, Savannah Mwesigwa, Eric Katagirya
